content:
I'm glad to hear that Luna's been doing okay with the toothbrushing, despite being a bit squirmy at times! It's great that you're making it a positive experience with treats afterwards. Consistency and patience are key when it comes to getting your cat used to toothbrushing.

As for Max's food, I'm happy to help! However, I think there might be some confusion - you didn't mention the brand of food you're looking for. Could you please share the brand name with me? That way, I can try to help you determine if Petco or PetSmart carries it.

Both Petco and PetSmart carry a wide range of pet food brands, so it's likely that they might carry the brand you're looking for. If they don't, you can always try checking with other pet stores in your area or online retailers like Chewy or Amazon.

Remember to also check the store's website or call them beforehand to confirm availability of the specific product you're looking for. This can save you a trip if they don't have it in stock.
